about_the_game:
DISCLAIMER

The supporter edition does not include Episode 1 or the contents of the deluxe edition.

OVERVIEW

Enjoy even more of the College Kings 2 – Episode 1 experience with the Supporter Edition!

This special Supporter Edition DLC helps us fast-track the development of future College Kings episodes. All revenue goes straight into the development process to allow us to release higher quality episodes more frequently.

As a token of our gratitude, we offer the following with the Supporter Edition:

1. EXCLUSIVE EROTICA SHORT STORIES
Three exclusive and scintillating College Kings erotica short stories that leave little to the imagination.

2. ADDITIONAL IMAGE BONUS PACK
A collection of 12 new to Steam bonus high resolution promotional images of the girls. These are images that have never been available on Steam.

TO ACCESS THIS EXCLUSIVE CONTENT


All exclusive content can be found in the Steam installation directory of the game in the folder: “supporter_content" (Steam\SteamApps\common\College Kings after the “supporter_content” DLC has finished downloading.

OR
Right click \"College Kings 2\" in your Steam Library and select \"Properties\". Under the \"Local Files\" tab, select \"Browse Local Files\". Within the local files, locate a folder called \“supporter_content\."

content_descriptors.notes: College Kings contains sexual depictions, violence and drug references that some viewers may find offensive. All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are 18 years old and over. This Adult Visual Novel is not intended for audiences under 18 years old.

OR
Right click \"College Kings 2\" in your Steam Library and select \"Properties\". Under the \"Local Files\" tab, select \"Browse Local Files\". Within the local files, locate a folder called \“supporter_content\."

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible

name: College Kings 2 - Episode 1 Supporter Upgrade

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy College Kings 2 - Episode 1 Supporter Upgrade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enjoy even more of the College Kings 2 – Episode 1 experience and show your support for the series with the Supporter Edition! This special Supporter Edition DLC is a way for fans to show their support for the development of the College Kings series.
